name: Puzzle Time (guilty_D_games)
description:
A simple GameBoy puzzle game for you to break your brain. Made with GB Studio in a 1-bit pixel style.

Move around the blocks to get to the goal.

So now prove yourself.

CONTROLS

Action
GameBoyWebMoveD-PadWASD / Arrow Keys
Menu Pause / Cancel
BX / K
AcceptAZ / J
